metadata.description:
Collecting issues #1-8 (181 pages!) of this amazing series!
The government, in an effort to maintain the delicate balance between a growing population and dwindling food supplies, regulates childbirth rates in the few remaining cities. Those born illegally are hunted down and killed by lifeless corporate-sponsored machines programmed to perform the dirty work of their makers. The only opposition comes from those children whose lives are forfeit the moment they exist. The Resistance is packed with action, dazzling visuals, cutting social commentary, and a unique vision of the future. Written by Justin Gray and Jimmy Palmiotti, with art by Juan Santacruz.
metadata.name: The Resistance
